## 12.2.1 Exercises

1. Create an object that represents a pink histogram with 100 bins.

```{r}
p <- ggplot(txhousing, aes(sales))
ph <- geom_histogram(bins=100,color="pink",fill="pink")
p + ph
```

2. Create an object that represents a fill scale with the Blues ColorBrewer palette.

```{r}
fs_blues <- scale_color_brewer(palette = "Blues")
p + geom_histogram() + fs_blues 
```
